title: Can't connect league account to twitch.tv
body:
Title.

It says something like "connection to riot failed", tried for around a week now and it still won't work. Typing in my nickname, changing the rune page's name and it won't work at all. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Y'know, I just tried this again myself and it's not working for me either =(. We don't control how that profile linking works, since Twitch owns all of their own services. They basically have the ability to link up with our api stuff to gather the data to link your accounts. 

I'd really suggest hitting them up on Twitch (I believe they do a majority of their support there?) to see if something might actually be broken since the runes reforged update.
I have been having the same problem for about 2 weeks. Mine says "riot linked failed." :(
